,

welcome to your folder party

step 1: look around, get settled ☁

all your files and furniture are here. you can drag all the items around. click on the files to view their contents.

step 2: arrange your space ☼

move everything where you'd like it to be for your guests. the space can be as big as you want it to be.

tip: you can also open up the website file at any point to make changes to the html, css, and javascript code. (there's no magic! this is just a website.)

step 3: save your layout ⚘

press the "save" button to save a copy of this file with all adjustments. when you're ready to finalize the layout, you can save a copy without these instructions.

warning ⚠ layout adjustments are temporary until you save them. refreshing this page without saving will reset any layout adjustments you've made.
